author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Israel Chemicals Announces Offering Of New Long-Dated 20-30 Years Senior Notes
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Israel Chemicals Ltd:
* ISRAEL CHEMICALS ANNOUNCES OFFERING OF NEW LONG-DATED 20-30 YEARS SENIOR NOTES AND CONCURRENT CASH TENDER OFFER FOR ANY AND ALL OF ITS 4.500% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2024 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
